title: Tinhead
description: To his club, Tinhead is the joker of the pack. One of the Devils Reapers MC's most desired men, he has no shortage of admirers or bedmates, but eyes for just one woman; the elusive Jade Smith, whose connection to him runs deeper than he thinks...All too aware of their shared past, Jade is determined to refuse Tinhead's advances at every turn, sure she has no interest in the MC's confident clown. When she is faced with the opportunity to get even, she is shocked to find that revenge isn't as sweet as she thought it would be and all is not as it seems.As Jade learns that this clown is more than his cover, she finds herself drawn ever closer to Tinhead, and it becomes clear that his head is a minefield that only she can navigate. As Tinhead's past threatens to overwhelm him and he stares down the barrel of impending doom, both love and life are put on the line.When faced with an ultimatum, will the Devils Reapers' newest member find the strength to follow his heart and fight for his future, or will the weight of his former life prove too much to bear?𝑭𝒊𝒏𝒅 𝒐𝒖𝒕 𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒆𝒎𝒐𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒇𝒐𝒖𝒓𝒕𝒉 𝒊𝒏𝒔𝒕𝒂𝒍𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕 𝒐𝒇 𝑫𝒆𝒗𝒊𝒍𝒔 𝑹𝒆𝒂𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒔 𝑴𝑪 𝒔𝒆𝒓𝒊𝒆𝒔.💔 𝘌𝘯𝘦𝘮𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘵𝘰 𝘓𝘰𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘴/𝘏𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘢𝘤𝘩𝘦🖤 𝘙𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯𝘨𝘦🧡 𝘓𝘢𝘶𝘨𝘩𝘴🖤 𝘌𝘹 𝘈𝘳𝘮𝘺🧡 𝘝𝘦𝘳𝘺 𝘋𝘢𝘳𝘬 𝘙𝘰𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦🖤 𝘈𝘯𝘥 𝘢 𝘷𝘦𝘳𝘺 𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘱𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘳𝘪𝘢𝘵𝘦 1𝘴𝘵 𝘋𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘴𝘯𝘢𝘤𝘬... 😜
author: Ruby  Carter
